other_tests.findings: Severe osteoporosis (Z-scores: L2â€“L4, -5.6 SD; femur neck, -3.9 SD).
other_tests.changes_over_time: Bone mineral density improved after 2.5 years of treatment with risedronate.

other_tests.findings: Coarse trabeculae with loss of connectivity and a strongly increased bone turnover; no evidence for mastocytosis or osteomalacia.
Two compound heterozygous missense mutations detected in LRP5; no mutations in COL1A1 or COL1A2.
